thread.title: Sr. Financial Analyst at Creative Financial Staffing (Baltimore, MD)
thread.title_full: Sr. Financial Analyst at Creative Financial Staffing (Baltimore, MD)

title: Sr. Financial Analyst at Creative Financial Staffing (Baltimore, MD)
text:
StartWire 
JOB SUMMARY 
Employee reportsto the Manager of Financial Planning and Analysis. Provides support to the Controller, Executiveand Operational Management Teams. Maintainsthe Key Performance Indicators. Assistwith financial reporting, financial analysis, the budget process, and forecasting. 
ESSENTIALDUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES 
Develop and maintain corporate, departmental and operational KPIs 
Financial Reporting 
Assist with the development and maintenance of financial reports 
Distribute monthly expense statement to responsible department heads and operational management 
Provide support and training to report users, as needed 
Financial Analysis 
Assist with the account analysis to explain significant trend changes and/or variances to budget 
Develop ad hoc reports 
Budget model development and maintenance 
Maintain staffing modules for use in budgets 
Develop budget standards for specific expense or group of expenses 
Prepare and distribute budget templates to departments heads and operational management 
Provide support and training to budget preparers and approvers 
Track budget process 
Budget consolidation and reconciliation with rolling forecast 
Forecasting 
Maintain staffing and capital expenditure modules for use in forecasting 
Assist in updating quarterly forecasts 
SKILLSREQUIRED 
Proficient in MS Excel and MS Word software 
Experience with Microsoft Dynamics-Great Plains accounting or similar software 
Proficient in Prophix CPM or similar software and MDX language 
Experience with Sisense BI & Analytics Dashboard or similar software 
EDUCATIONAND EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS 
Graduation from an accredited four-year college or university with a degree in accounting business or finance. 
Five or more years of professional related experience in budgeting or accounting or any equivalent combination of education, experience, and training that provides the required knowledge, skills, and abilities.
